channel.title: Adding a "Owner" Crown [Req]
channel.description:
Hey everyone. Well i read the tutorial from GalkonsPride - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,265260.0.html And i was wondering how would i go about adding a crown for Lvl 3 Admins "Owners"
No spam please, Thanks.

item.title: Adding a "Owner" Crown [Req]
item.dc:creator: @Liliky Liliky
item.description:
@Liliky wrote:

supra s:

Client /help section …

There is no Client Help section other then this?
Only MOPARSCAPE Client help which is asking help for the MOPARSCAPE client.
This has nothing to do with the MOPARSCAPE client.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a "Owner" Crown [Req]
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Jellybean732, post:2, topic:247961”]not sure if it’ll work but i wud guess

else if (s.equalsIgnoreCase("mod_icons") && i == 3) { try { Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./sprites/"+s+" "+i+".png"); //System.getProperty("user.dir") + "\\"+i+".png"); anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441]; PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440); pixelgrabber.grabPixels(); //System.out.println(s+" "+i+".png"+ " hopefully loaded"); } catch (Exception exception) { System.out.println(((Object) (exception))); } }

then make a new mod icon file with a 3 at the end, tell me if it works[/quote]
It’s more complicated than that.

@OP: Take a good look at the client and see how the mod and admin crowns are shown.

Read full topic
